roleset.name: make liquid, literally or in financial sense

example.name: liquidize-v: Transitive, financial sense
example.text: Prince Al-Waleed denied that the Kingdom Holding Company had liquidized any portfolio it had in the Kingdom.
example.arg: any portfolio it had in the Kingdom.

roleset.note: LIQUIDIZE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from liquidize.01-v)

roleset.name: state of matter: fluid

example.name: liquid-j
example.text: This layer is called the low - velocity zone , and scientists have concluded that this zone is at least partially liquid .

roleset.note: LIQUID-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.
